title: Remove About stats and Caffeine.ai footer attribution

requirements.text: Remove the "5+" / "Years Experience" and "50+" / "Projects Completed" statistic blocks from the About section so these claims no longer appear anywhere on the page.

quotes: remove the 5 + year, 50 clients and the made using caffeine ai at the bottom

acceptanceCriteria: The About section no longer displays a "5+" years experience statistic.
The About section no longer displays a "50+" projects/clients statistic.
No other part of the page contains the removed "5+" or "50+" stats text.

requirements.text: Remove the footer attribution line at the bottom of the page that says the site was "Built with" and links to "caffeine.ai" so that "made using caffeine ai" (or equivalent) no longer appears.

quotes: remove the 5 + year, 50 clients and the made using caffeine ai at the bottom

acceptanceCriteria: The bottom-of-page/footer area no longer contains the text "Built with" and no longer links to "caffeine.ai".
No other part of the page contains any "made using caffeine ai" / "built with caffeine" attribution text.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change any other marketing copy, pricing content, or navigation labels beyond removing the specified stats and footer attribution.
